#id=1
#text=The Empty Refrigerator One evening I returned home from work and realized that I was very hungry .
#id=2
#text=However , when I opened the door to my refrigerator , I saw that there was nothing in it besides a gallon of water and a half-used bottle of ketchup .
#id=3
#text=I opened my freezer to only find two trays of ice .
#id=4
#text=This did not look promising at all .
#id=5
#text=Since I was very hungry , I decided to go out to eat and then go grocery shopping .
#id=6
#text=I went to eat at a restaurant near my favorite grocery store and then started my grocery shopping quest .
#id=7
#text=I first went to the produce aisle and picked out an assortment of fruits and vegetables .
#id=8
#text=I then proceeded to the meat section where I picked out some chicken , pork chops , hamburger , and a beef roast .
#id=9
#text=Next , I picked up some canned items and some taco shells , taco seasoning , pizza crust mix , and peanut buttter .
#text=After this , I went to the dairy section and picked up some cheese and milk .
#text=My next stop was the frozen section where I tossed some ready-made meals in my cart along with chicken strips , frozen vegetables , tator tots , and frozen pizza .
#text=Before I made it to the checkout area , I picked up a loaf of bread .
#text=I know had a good assortment of food and it would be a long time before I would come home to an empty refrigerator and freezer again which was a very good thing .
